resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

fields.summary: Precisely calculate acked length of striped block groups in updatePipeline

fields.description:

comments.body: This looks the same as HDFS-11882 where we've got a patch that seems close, let's dupe to that one.
